benchmark_details.name: Evaluating LLMsâ€™ Multilingual Capabilities for Bengali: Benchmark Creation and Performance Analysis
benchmark_details.overview: This work contributes by publicly releasing a comprehensive suite of high-quality Bengali benchmark datasets, along with the accompanying translation pipeline and codebase to facilitate reproducible research and future advancements in Bengali NLP evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the performance of LLMs on benchmark datasets specific to the Bengali language, providing insights on the models' capabilities and limitations.

data.source: Translating major English benchmark datasets into Bengali.
data.annotation: Machine translated, followed by human review for quality.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated as the proportion of correctly answered questions. RER captures the rate at which model responses do not conform to any valid answer formats.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Accuracy and lower RER indicate better model performance.
methodology.validation: Error analysis conducted to pinpoint primary failure modes.
